projects.name: Credit Card Fraud Detection
highlights: Built a program using machine learning techniques to detect fraudulent transactions using a dataset from kaggle
Achieved more than 80% detection of fraudulent transactions on unseen data without compromising on precision

projects.name: Beauty Inc. Dashboard
highlights: Analysed data from a beauty products brand to derive insights on trends across categories, markets, segments etc.
Recommended actions to achieve set targets
Designed a dashboard using Tableau to visualize the insights for the stakeholders

awards.title: Academic Excellence Prize
awards.summary: For securing second position in order of merit in Mechanical Engineering department

awards.title: Late Shri G.M. Gawande Prize
awards.summary: For securing highest CGPA among OBC students
